item.title: Static Page Blog
item.description: Static pages are awesome for a small personal blog. Much better than a dynamic web application such as wordpress or the new node.js one gost. Why? Because of secuirty. Most small personal sites my not stay update as often as a professionally run site and that open the door to exploits. Static pages are awesome for a small personal blog. Much better than a dynamic web application such as wordpress or the new node.
